channel.title: Charlie & Yash
channel.description: In which Charlie and Yash drive from and sometimes to their institution of education and discuss.
channel.author: Charlie Kruse and Yash Plorer

item.title: Ethics and the Decline of Suburbia
item.description: In which Charlie and Yash discuss a riveting conversation with a mutual acquaintance on ethics and note the influence of housing on adult friendships.
